Date: Saturday, 4/5/1989
Subject: Billy Ripken
Billy Ripken is ready to be activated from the DL!

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Matt Walbeck
Dear Sir,
Matt Walbeck has an AVG of .290 at A Kenosha Twins!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Dan Walters
Dear Sir,
Dan Walters has nothing more to prove at AA Orlando Twins!
He has an AVG of .324 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/13/1989
Subject: Drew Hall healing process
Drew Hall is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 5/19/1989
Subject: Progress of Billy Ripken
Dear Sir,
Billy Ripken is hitting the ball well at AA Orlando Twins!
He has an AVG of .286, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/20/1989
Subject: Drew Hall healing process
Drew Hall is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
